name: Whispers
summary: The Whispers is a ruined castle on Crackclaw Point in the northeastern Crownlands. An ancient seat of House Crabb, the downtrodden castle sits on the edge of a cliff. The castle, which is triangular with square towers at its corners, is overgrown with forest from its godswood, which contains soldier pines and a young weirwood. The beacon tower collapsed when Dick Crabb was a boy and now sits in the sea below the castle.[1] There is a smuggler's cove nearby.[2]
